title: Strengthening CS Competencies in Practice: Information Literacy Enhancement Program for In-Service Elementary School Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can apply a three-stage verification framework to evaluate the credibility of information from diverse sources in practical contexts.
Learners can explain methods for complying with copyright regulations and creating original content in digital environments.
Learners can compare and analyze at least three information retrieval strategies in mobile-based microlearning environments.
Learners can develop practical examples of integrating information literacy elements into classroom instruction design through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
